name: ONUS
description: Launched in March 2020, ONUS is a cryptocurrency investment application. After 18 months of deployment and improvement, ONUS is now one of the most used digital assets investment applications in Vietnam, with more than 3 million users and a complete ecosystem of investment products. ONUS focuses on new entrants to the cryptocurrency market by developing user-friendly, secure digital financial investment solutions that everyone can use. Aside from being one of the top digital assets investment applications in Vietnam, ONUS has launched a whole ecosystem of functionalities for its users. ONUS Chain is a high-performance, scalable, EVM-compatible, and secure smart-contract platform built on BNB Application Sidechain (BAS). It’s a friendly platform with a familiar interface accessible to all developers and users with low entry costs and gas fees. ONUS Chain aims to become “A blockchain for mass adoption of DeFi and Web 3.0.”
